mapper.insert: INSERT INTO filmgenre(filmgenreno, genreno, filmno) VALUES (filmgenre_seq.nextval, #{genreno}, #{filmno})
mapper.select: SELECT filmgenreno, genreno, filmno FROM filmgenre ORDER BY filmgenreno DESC
SELECT filmgenreno, genreno, filmno FROM filmgenre WHERE filmno = #{filmno} ORDER BY filmgenreno DESC

SELECT g.genreno, g.genrename, f.filmno, x.filmgenreno, x.genreno as x_genreno, x.filmno as x_filmno FROM genre g, film f, filmgenre x WHERE g.genreno = x.genreno AND f.filmno = x.filmno AND f.filmno = #{filmno} ORDER BY g.genreno DESC
